import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Component } from "react" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import { Props, KTPData as State } from '../../../interface/Interfaces' import { mapDispatchToProps, mapStateToProps } from "../../../app/functions" class InputKtp extends Component { man: string = 'LAKI-LAKI' woman: string = 'PEREMPUAN' default: State = { nik: '', name: '', place_dateOfBirth: 'SERANG, 00-00-0000', gender: '', bloodType: ' - ', address: 'KP. DOMAS', rt: '000', rw: '000', districts: 'PONTANG', village: 'DOMAS', religion: 'ISLAM', maritalStastus: 'BELUM KAWIN', profession: 'BELUM/TIDAK BEKERJA', citizenship: 'WNI', validUntil: 'SEUMUR HIDUP' } constructor(props: Props){ super(props) this.state = this.default } eventHendler = (e: any) => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } submit = () => { console.log(this.state) } render = () => { return( <>
NIK Nama Tempat, Tanggal lahir Jenis Kelamin Golongan Darah Alamat RT RW Kelurahan / Desa Kecamaan Agama Status Perkawinan Pekerjaan Kewarganegaraan Berlaku Hingga

) } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(InputKtp))
